XII.ii.2.C.1.a
.
Using VA Form 21P-4180 to Obtain Information From SSA
Use
VA Form 21P-4180, Request for Certification by Social Security Administration
, to obtain information from the Social Security Administration (SSA) as to whether the special allowance under
38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
may be payable to an eligible survivor or survivors.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Development of Claims for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
